labels.analysis: The MCP Server Memos is primarily focused on memo management, allowing users to create and search memos through a simple API. The core functionality revolves around note-taking and organization, with features like tagging to manage and retrieve memos efficiently. It solves the problem of dispersed notes by centralizing memo storage and retrieval.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Memory Management" is chosen because the server's main functionality involves storing, retrieving, and organizing memos, which aligns with note-taking and knowledge base management. The secondary label "API Integration" is relevant due to the emphasis on interacting with memos through an API. The server doesn't require a custom label as its functionality fits well within the predefined categories.

server_info_crawled.name: Memos MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @LeslieLeung/mcp-server-memos
server_info_crawled.overview: Search and create memos effortlessly with this server. Enhance your note-taking experience by integrating memo management into your applications. Utilize a simple API to interact with your memos securely and efficiently.

tools.name: create_memo
tools.description:
Create a new memo with the Memos API.

Args:
    content: Content of the memo
    tags: List of tags for the memo (will always include the default tag)

Returns:
    The created memo object

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@LeslieLeung/mcp-server-memos/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: MEMOS_API_KEY
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: API key for authenticating with the memos server.
